dialogue.content: I want to move more, but I'm pretty sedentary right now.
What kind of movement feels most realistic-walking, cycling, home workouts?
Got it. Do you prefer a daily goal or a few days per week?
Daily, but it has to be small. I overdo it and then quit.
Understood. Any time of day that's easiest?
Okay. We'll keep it small and build consistency first.
If I could hit a simple evening walking goal consistently, I'd feel better about my health.
